Summary

I am a Software Developer based on Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil. I am proficient on several programming languages and web development frameworks (mostly self-taught). I am also a Machine Learning and Computer Vision master degree student, working specifically on the application of Deep Learning approaches to Handwritten Signature Verification.

Open Source projects

  • k-nearest neighbors: A Python implementation of the simple supervised learning algorithm k-nearest neighbors.

  • Particle Swarm Optimization: A not-finished but working implementation of the metaheuristic Particle Swarm Optimization implemented in Python.

  • ppgec-abntex2: A customization of the package abnTeX2 (ABNT is a brazillian association that creates techinical norms for academic writing) for the PPGEC-POLI dissertations.

  • cv-toolbox: A bunch of unorganized scripts that I used during the development of the final project for the Computer Vision course I took at POLI.

  • redjit: I am currently working on this project. My idea is to "clone" popular webapps (and eventually write a how-to guide detailing the project) in Django during my idle time, in order to prevent that my Django skills get "rusty".
